rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0001
rows.name: Nanakoori, we've arrived!

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0002
rows.name:
This is the view you
wanted to see, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0003
rows.name: Aaaand we're here!

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0004
rows.name:
This is the place you meant,
right, Nanakoori?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0005
rows.name:
I believe this is the place you
were talking about, Nanakoori.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0006
rows.name:
You wanted to see the view
here, if I recall?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0007
rows.name:
This is the place you wanted to come
to, right, Nanakoori?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0008
rows.name:
I suppose you wanted to eyeball the
view or something.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0009
rows.name: That's right.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0012
rows.name:
Scenery indeed very nice. But did
Nanakoori want to see something
particular?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0013
rows.name: Um, yes. That.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0014
rows.name: Red tree thing?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0015
rows.name: Y-yes... It's a Saffronia tree.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0016
rows.name:
There's an old nursery rhyme
about this tree...

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0017
rows.name: I always loved it.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0018
rows.name: Oh? Like, a lullaby?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0019
rows.name:
You're pretty sensitive to
music, aren't you, Nanakoori.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0020
rows.name: Oh yeah?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0021
rows.name: I guess songs are your kind of thing.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0022
rows.name: A children's song?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0023
rows.name: You're very attuned to music, Nanakoori.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0024
rows.name: A kid's song, eh?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0025
rows.name:
Anything musical's right up your street,
huh?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0026
rows.name: I guess.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0027
rows.name: It's...something I'm drawn to.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0028
rows.name:
That little bit strange.
Tora never hear Nanakoori sing.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0029
rows.name: Nanakoori only like listen to music?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0030
rows.name: Well, I like to sing, certainly.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0031
rows.name: But I get...nervous around people...

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0032
rows.name:
Nanakoori really very shy person, huh?
Feels eyes of spectators on her.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0033
rows.name: S-sorry...

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0034
rows.name: What should I say...

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0035
rows.name: Do I make you nervous too?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0036
rows.name: Can you play an instrument, too?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0037
rows.name: What should I say...

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0038
rows.name: I don't make you nervous though, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0039
rows.name: D'you play any instruments?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0040
rows.name: What should I say...

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0041
rows.name: Do even I make you feel abashed?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0042
rows.name: Do you play an instrument as well?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0043
rows.name: What should I say...

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0044
rows.name: I don't make you nervous though, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0045
rows.name: Hey, can you play an instrument?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0101
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0102
rows.name:
That very daring question.
Even Tora was little bit surprised!

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0103
rows.name: Whew, so it's not just me...

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0104
rows.name:
Tora want to know too, though.
How Nanakoori really feel?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0105
rows.name: Erm...

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0109
rows.name: I don't dislike you or anything...but...

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0110
rows.name:
I do find it a bit hard to feel
comfortable around you. I'm sorry!

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0111
rows.name: Nanakoori not need worry so much!

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0112
rows.name:
When Tora first meet boss and
friends, Tora lose tongue and run out of
words. Took long time to make friends!

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0113
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Think ]That's...not how I remember it...

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0114
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Uh-huh. Sure you did.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0115
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Think ]How very unlike Tora...

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0116
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Is Tora pulling our legs?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0117
rows.name: [ML:Feeling ]So it took you a while?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0118
rows.name:
Maybe...I can get used to everyone in
time, too.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0119
rows.name:
I...I'd really like to get comfortable
with everyone, so we can really
enjoy our time together...

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0120
rows.name:
As long as you feel that way,
I'm sure it'll work out!

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0121
rows.name: Don't worry, these things take time.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0122
rows.name:
Hey, I'm sure it'll be fine,
if you want it that much.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0123
rows.name:
I guess it's just something you can't
rush.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0124
rows.name:
Nanakoori, you're very sincere, so I'm sure
you'll achieve your goal.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0125
rows.name: No need to rush. Just take your time.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0126
rows.name:
Hey, chill out. It takes time to adjust to
the ways of the Zekenator.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0127
rows.name:
Just go with the flow. Let it happen.
Some things can't be rushed.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0128
rows.name: Okay!

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0201
rows.name:
Tora bet Nanakoori can play every
instrument!

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0202
rows.name:
Um, I'm not very good, but...
I can play a few.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0203
rows.name:
More than one?! Wow!
Which is best instrument?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0204
rows.name:
Maybe the organ?
I also quite like the lute...

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0205
rows.name: Actually, Tora can play Whispercorder!

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0206
rows.name:
Nopon children forced to play from
age of about five years.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0207
rows.name: Oh! I'd love to hear you play sometime.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0208
rows.name: Tora and Nanakoori should make duet!

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0209
rows.name: I'd like that.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0210
rows.name:
Actually, Hana also play.
Can blow mean trumpet!

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0211
rows.name:
Fan-based lungs capable
of incredible sustain!

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0212
rows.name: That's amazing!

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0213
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]It feels like she's forgotten
all about me...

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0214
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]But that'sokay, as long as she
seems to be having a good time.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0215
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]I hope someday she can be this
friendly with everyone!

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0216
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Is it just me, or has she
forgotten I'm even here?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0217
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]But she seems to be
having a great time.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0218
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Maybe one day she'll be able
to have fun talking about music
with the whole gang!

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0219
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]She seems to have tuned
out my presence...

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0220
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]But she seems to be relaxing and
enjoying herself. That's a good thing.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0221
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Perhaps one day, she will be able to
share her musical interests with us all.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0222
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]You've gotta be kidding me...
Has she forgotten I'm even here?

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0223
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]But ah, it's fine. She seems to be
letting herself go and having a blast.

rows.label: kizunatalk069_msg0224
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Maybe one day, she'll be able to
just hang loose like this with us all.
